pkgmetadata.longdescription: Spectral Clustering-Based Method for Identifying B Cell Clones // Provides a computational framework for unsupervised identification B cell clones from adaptive immune receptor repertoire sequencing (AIRR-Seq) datasets. This method is based on spectral clustering of the junction sequences of B cell receptors (BCRs, also referred to as Immunoglobulins, (Igs)) that share the same V gene, J gene and junction length.
